newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +1.39 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +1.39 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 29.202 to the dollar after Wednesday's fixing at 29.331, and at 17.352 to the mark from 17.344.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +1.39 percent, after a deviation of +1.26 on Thursday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +1.38 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
